replies.body: https://68.media.tumblr.com/72f5da98d2c32ca25301ccf38b48b339/tumblr_n3ho027vmT1r0wlweo1_500.gif
RIght, nova was the first thing i thought of too
Incoming PF Ezreal salt.

Maybe that's unnecessary.
Look at the white rifle and the hand holding it. There is a white robotic hand shown in the picture.

That skin is probably not from Pulsefire, but Program.

It's definitely Pulsefire according the leak and according the voiceline teaser, however I agree it looks like Program or Blue Headhunter skin. But Riot gave up on not overlapping some skin concepts quite ago, so it's not surprising.

The leak was not 100% accurate, though.
It said that Maokai is getting "sticky bombs" as his saplings and it called Xayah and Rakan "harpy and the phoenix".

So there is still the chance that it changed a bit.
And just because it is related to the pulsefire skin with the voiceline doesn't have to mean that it's the same line. They can just link Program and Pulsefire in lore, making them enemies and therefore Caitlyn is part of the Program skin line.

We will see how it turns out, I would prefer if Ultimate skins stay unique.

EDIT: Nevermind, just saw the gameplay reveal. It clearly isn't a Program skin. So it seems Ultimate skins are not unique anymore....
Harpy and Phoenix sounds like names you'd use for them in internal development, so there's that. The leak has so far been very accurate as far as leaks go.

Maokia did get sticky bomb sapplings.
If you throw a sappling in a bush, it "grows" and rushes to a nearby champion to explode, dealing two more ticks of damage after the explosion (visually it attaches to a champion).
Well, ultimate skins might still remain unique since her model really reminds me of Blue Headhunter more.
But all the skins were legit soooo

Welp, If the skin as Legendary will end up looking better than Ultimate skin it would be understsndable.

However I think Riot might try to update Pulsefire Ezreal eventually to calm the wave.
I thought Riot said they wouldn't make other skins based off of ultimate skins.
Times change?
https://i.giphy.com/jssppK2icBS1i.gif

Change "media" for "i", remove "/media/" and "/giphy".

Or just right click on the picture and "Show image" or "Copy Link".

https://i.giphy.com/jssppK2icBS1i.gif
Got it. Thanks. ;P

Add ?noredirect

Also, knew what it was before clicking. RIP you meathead.
Giphy made some changes (heh) and hotlinking like this doesn't work.

Video teaser:

https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/videos/10158857740685556/
Just checkin' in, waiting for the **_"SHOTGUN KNEES"_** comment. lol

Fuck shotguns... Star Guardian Ezreal!!!

And a new wave of hate because yet again the same champs will get skins this year as last year...
Yasuo, Fizz, Riven (if the rework counts), Kha'Zix, Orianna, Master Yi, Caitlyn.

With the only remembered being Veigar (2-year gap), Twitch (1-year gap).
I hope we're not getting just one skin.

Usually when we get a legendary we don't get many more unless they are all part of the theme (I.e. Star Guardian).  When we got God Fist Lee Sin he was really the only skin since the Dreadnova Darius is a Hextech Exclusive.

This one might include the Pulsefire Ezreal update that Riot mentioned last year though.
It kinda looks a bit like program with that white rifle.
Maybe the Pulsefire skins will be apart of the Project & Program world?

Probably. Pulsefire Ezreal was sent back from the future to stop the machines from taking over the world, right?
Maybe these machines he is fighting are the Program skin line and Caitlyn is now sent back to find and kill Ezreal, being his direct enemy but from the **Program** skin line. 

Maybe all the QQ about Pulsefire Ezreal not being unique anymore was unwarranted.
seems legit
{{summoner:11}}
Glad I'm not the only one noticing that.

And not just a rifle. Taking a closer look at the hand holding the rifle shows that it is a white robotic hand.

So all the fear about the pulsefire Ezreal not being unique anymore was probably not needed. It seems this skin is going to be from the program line. Don't know about it, are program and pulsefire related in lore? If I remember correctly, Ezreal was coming back from the future to stop the the machines to take over the world. Maybe these machines are the program skin line and Caitlyn is Ezreals direct enemy?

The biggest problem with the Program theory is that despite the white, the rest of what we see lines up better with Pulsefire.

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Soraka_6.jpg
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Fiora_4.jpg
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Ezreal_5.jpg


With Program, the finer details of hair is replaced with cords. We see finer detail than cords in the shadows, which lines up better with either Project or Pulsefire.

The "robotic hand" is a trait shared between all 3 lines, all of which look roughly the same. 

The light we can see coming off the figure matches more closely with Pulsefire's aesthetics too.

Plus there's the [PBE voice teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uK4FfSLx7Yg), where Pulsefire Ezreal's communication with PEARL gets interrupted by Cait hacking in and saying "Nowhere to hide".

Exactly, Pulsefire Ezreal's communication with Pearl gets **interrupted** by Cait and she says **"nowhere to hide"**.
Meaning that she is the direct opponent of Pulsefire Ezreal. While it is possible that they are opponents and still in the same skin line, it is possible that she is part of another antagonistic skin line too.

The white robotic hand clearly shares more similarity with Program than the other lines. Project has a completely other color theme and Pulsefire Ezreal is pretty different in design, too.

The white design clearly points in the direction Program for me. I am pretty sure, I **bet** it is going to be a program skin. I don't think that Riot wants to ruin the unique Ultimate skin for Ezreal. And Ultimates are supposed to be exactly that, unique.

While Ultimate Skins *should* be unique, Pulsefire Ezreal has frankly run out of unique factors.

- Changing when you level up your Ultimate? {{champion:121}} 's bread and butter
- Two sets of voice actors? {{champion:203}} and {{champion:83}} say hello
- Particles? Most of PFE's particles are white versions of his default particles rather than anything different, making it worse than most 1350 skins.

I don't think having a unique name on a skin is enough to call it unique anymore.

Looks like it's going to be awesome! Unfortunately that's directly proportional to the amount of times I will see her bot lane as a Tristana enthusiast. Hooray for oppressive laning, ug, but at least it'll be pretty!
http://bbsimg.ngfiles.com/1/18838000/ngbbs49cce10c75baf.jpg

>http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/599/378/e68.jpg

http://t11.deviantart.net/nAhpUZFP_P_f79c60j4LAaTyTek=/fit-in/700x350/filters:fixed_height(100,100):origin()/pre07/bff4/th/pre/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png
in the end she is so different from Pulsefire Ezreal https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Q1-t7imhlsk/WQi-VN6ttrI/AAAAAAAAkMI/RUN8YRWn-S8UI7OPyJAJLRVW2fJu6YOlQCLcB/s1600/2.png
I mean, it's her gun that's the skin, all the animation and work went into her gun (rightfully so). I'm just happy to see a Cait skin where she doesn't look like a Cat in the hat dropout.
True.  Though now that his Texture update is out as well, they have a similarity again.  I still say hers has better quality overall though.

Looking at the silhouette (ignoring it was Caitlyn's name in that list which was leaked), Quinn and Vayne are other potential owners.

Their weapons are different, that is true, but come on - a current-day legendary skin can easily get a remodeled weapon.
Remember, we're not exactly talking Annie in Wonderland or The Magnificent Twisted Fate (lack of) quality levels anymore.

Jhin is another one, considering his physical build, the size/shape of his weapon, the portrayed mechanical arm, and whatever the bulge on his back is.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CZL1eixU8AAF3hF.jpg https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C-0fqV9VoAAVASI.jpg
The gameplay teaser confirms that it is Caitlyn.

I stand - sorry; _sit_ - corrected.

_I don't do Facebook...and Cait got enough skins (or put differently, I got enough skins for Cait) to bother searching for a confirmation._

https://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/overwatch.gamepedia.com/5/52/Widowmaker_Skin_Talon.png
Ayy
Finally! Can't wait for a set of new VO lines on Cait since forever!
Yeah, but where is my demonblade teaser.....Ughhhh
Caitlyn will get a nerf after the skin comes out. 8D

Maybe its {{champion:202}} with long hair and that gun is just his cannon in ultimate form.










It is possible.
You do remember he just got the Blood Moon skin, right?

Yes and it would look cool if NOT THAT FUCKING MASK IN GAME LOOK, its SOOOOOOO ugly in splash it looks so fucking awsome without that mouth mark but in game its like NOOO WHYYY you ruined it!!! {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

If so, Jhin sports a ponytail now? I don't want to see that. :/
That said, there is the "bulge" on his back to consider, as is the right-hand mechanical arm.

We'll see.
